thread.title_full: Bedouin driver shot by Israeli police was not carrying out attack, probe set to show - Israel News - Haaretz.com

author: Yaniv Kubovich
title: Bedouin driver shot by Israeli police was not carrying out attack, probe set to show - Israel News - Haaretz.com
text: > Israel News Bedouin Driver Shot by Israeli Police Was Not Carrying Out Attack, Probe Set to Show Netanyahu and security officials were quick to call the incident a 'terrorist' attack, but the investigation is set to prove otherwise. Findings are 'not good for police,' legal experts say.
